title: Shadowkeep Showdown
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship vanquishes a vampire lord
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship fought and defeated Rhodar von Glauer, a vampire, in a magically darkened chamber.
Amidst the crumbling Shadowkeep, they escaped with valuable treasures while evading wraiths and leaving a venom troll in the ruins.
Dewalth used the Dream spell to discuss recent troubling events in Chardon with Lyra, revealing political intrigue.
Olen Vrask awarded the party the Jade Piece of Rai's Hand after proof of von Glauer's defeat, sparking a vision of Apollyon.
The Fellowship communicated with allies via Dream spell, learning new developments and reinforcing their main quest.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship overcame Rhodar von Glauer, survived the fall of Shadowkeep, and advanced their quest against Apollyon.
